Enhance App.net by adding useful features to the Alpha web app 

• Image previews – See images from posts without having to open them 
• Twitter character count – Ensure your post will fit within Twitter's 140-character limit when you crosspost to both networks 

(Update 9/16 – Removed 'repost' links since they've been enabled natively)
